About.description1: I am a full-stack developer with experience in creating modern web applications. My approach is uniquely shaped by an art school background and a degree in International Law, allowing me to merge design aesthetics with legal-grade precision
About.description2: I help businesses and private clients bring ideas to life through high-quality code and thoughtful design.
About.description3: Having worked in a family business since 2019, I see projects through a commercial lens. I ensure every line of code serves your strategic goals and accelerates growth
